snippet.title: Forgotten Skies Official Trailer | PC Release 08/11/2024
snippet.description:
The official Forgotten Skies trailer is here!

Check out the exclusive trailer for the highly anticipated release of our indiegame "Forgotten Skies". Dive into an exciting world of action, adventure and stunning graphics in this mix of a platfomergame and action-adventure. View the beautiful gameplay footage showing off some of the game's exciting features and content. 

Forgotten Skies will be released on August 11th, 2024 for PC on Steam.

________________________________________

References:
https://www.gamersglobal.de/spiel/271556/forgotten-skies
https://www.gamedeveloper.com/press-release/forgotten-skies-for-steam-announced
https://www.indiedb.com/games/forgotten-skies/news/gamplay-announcement-forgotten-skies
https://indiegameculture.com/news/adorable-meets-adventure-forgotten-skies-brings-chibi-platforming-fun-in-upcoming-release/
https://mundogamer.community/articles/forgotten-skies-will-arrive-on-steam-in-the-3rd-quarter-of-2024
________________________________________
